ygData.subject: Break out the insecticide
ygData.msgSnippet: Megatron led the way, walking quickly down the hall with his gun armed and ready. Aquarious, Paddle Tail, and Nighteyes followed closely. Megatron told them

Subject: Break out the insecticide
To: nbwrpg@egroups.com
MIME-Version: 1.0
Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit
X-Mailer: AOL 5.0 for Windows sub 41
From: JP3884@...

    Megatron led the way, walking quickly down the hall with his gun armed 
and ready. Aquarious, Paddle Tail, and Nighteyes followed closely. Megatron 
told them that they were near the armory, Inferno's favorite hangout. And 
while they were there they could easily pick up some wepons.
    "Paddle Tail, the door is locked. Get it open now! You two, keep a look 
out!" Megatron barked at them to there surprize. Paddle Tail quickly went to 
the door and fiddled with the controls.

    Inferno heard them at the door and grabbed his gun. No one was going to 
take him alive, not with out a fight. He was going to make them burn.
    "Invaders!" He yelled as the door opened and Megatron marched though, 
blasting frantically before Inferno knew what happened. The insect went down 
quickly, and tragically.
    "Night Eyes, Aquarious, take him. Paddle Tail, you select the wepons. 
Hurry, time is short!" he barked agian sending the Maximals scurrying. They 
did as they were told and soon were on there way agian.

    It wasnt a long trip until Megatron saw Terrorsaur walking towrds them. 
His team was concealed behinde a turn in the corridor. But, being the ever 
loyal Terrorsaur, there would be no problem.
    "My favorite little minion, come to help your leader escape?" Megatron 
said stepping into the corridor.

    Aracnia led the way, followed by Paralysis and Aerostreak. All they heard 
was Tarantulas screaming. They were armed and couldnt for the life of them 
figure out what was going on.
    They entered Megatron holding chamber to find the tube smashed and the 
Maximals gone. Tarantulas was on his knees curseing the sky. 
    "He's escaped! I want all Predacons to search this ship until the four of 
them are found! Now!" Aracnia screamed as she burst from the room heading 
towrds the bridge.
